aboutMe: Hi, I'm Alonso Paredes, a passionate software developer with expertise in frontend, backend, and mobile development. Specializing in: React, React Native, Expo, Next.js, and Nest.js. With 2+ years of hands-on experience, I have successfully delivered projects that leverage cutting-edge technologies.

I am driven by a deep passion for creating seamless user experiences and solving complex problems through innovative and efficient code. I thrive in dynamic environments and am dedicated to staying abreast of the latest industry trends, always seeking opportunities to enhance my development skills. My approach combines technical expertise with a creative mindset, enabling me to craft solutions that not only meet but exceed expectations.
